thread.title: Clock ticks for Tim Sherwood's misfits
thread.title_full: Clock ticks for Tim Sherwood's misfits

title: Clock ticks for Tim Sherwood's misfits
text:
Tweet 
Marko Arnautovic’s second-half goal earned Stoke their first away win in the Premier League since they beat Villa in February. 
It left the hosts searching for their first league success since the opening day of the season and they have earned just one point in their last seven games following Saturday’s 1-0 defeat. 
Sherwood signed 13 new players in the summer and started seven of them against Stoke but conceded he is yet to strike on the winning formula. 
He said: “You can’t persevere with a team who haven’t won. 
I am the manager and I have to take responsibility.” More on this story:
